text: Said to have shot the lid of a Bugman barrel from a thousand yards away. True or not: Gargul is a master gunner.
It is quite clear Wundal is not actually a wizard - yet he steadfastly believes to be the incarnate of the magical winds themselves.
Fabeled for mining even the most exotic mountains and caverns, stretching from Ind to the Frozen Wastes.
The best gunner of the Dawi kind never misses, atleast according to Gargul.
The best miners know it's not the size of the pickaxe that counts, it's how you wield it.
No one knows where Wundal gets these frogs from, it's clear something's fishy about them however.
